summary.span: 为 UWP 应用和 Windows 运行时提供 XAML 语言支持 API。

span.span: Provides XAML language support API for UWP apps and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml.Markup](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.markup) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Markup](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.markup) in the UWP API reference.
